text: Confluentimicrobium naphthalenivorans is a Gram-negative, aerobic, naphthalene-degrading, moderately halophilic and motile bacterium from the genus of Confluentimicrobium with a single flagellum which has been isolated from tidal flat sediments from the South Sea in Korea. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Confluentimicrobium naphthalenivorans at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Rhodobacteraceae Category:Bacteria described in 2015
title: Confluentimicrobium naphthalenivorans
